name: Raiders of the Lost Parts
description:
PvP asteroids style game made for Global Game Jam 2021 -- Lost and Found

You are searching for a space crystal to bring back to your mothership.

Shoot the enemy player to make them drop their cargo

Collect armor to protect yourself!

Use firefox for the best audio experience!

Controls:

Player OnePlayer TwoActionQ/WU/ISteerAJThrottleSKShootDLDrop Cargo and weapons
